classic.name: Duomo di Milano
classic.description: One of the largest cathedrals in the world, this iconic masterpiece took over 600 years to complete.
classic.address: P.za del Duomo, 20122 Milano MI, Italy

classic.name: Piazza del Duomo
classic.description: Central plaza flanked by the cathedral, the Royal Palace & the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II arcade.
classic.address: P.za del Duomo, 20122 Milano MI, Italy

classic.name: San Siro Stadium
classic.description: A.C. & Inter Milan's home ground with regular soccer matches, plus museum and stadium tours.

classic.name: Sforzesco Castle
classic.description: Huge Medieval-Renaissance fortress with historical museums & art by da Vinci and Michelangelo.

classic.name: Pinacoteca di Brera
classic.description: Graceful palazzo used by Napoleon, with medieval and Renaissance art especially from Northern Italy.

classic.description: Triumphal arch with bas-reliefs & statues, built by Luigi Cagnola on the request of Napoleon.

classic.name: Teatro alla Scala
classic.description: Lavish 18th-century theater famous for Italian opera & ballets, plus a museum & music library.

classic.name: Villa Necchi Campiglio
classic.description: Museum consisting of an architect-designed villa with decorative arts, paintings & period furniture.

classic.name: Basilica di Santa Maria delle Grazie
classic.description: Terracotta Renaissance church with elaborate Gothic interior, home to Da Vinci's The Last Supper.
classic.address: Via Giuseppe Antonio Sassi, 3, 20123 Milano MI, Italy
